properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\explorer.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\rundll32.exe") and (not(InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "\\shell32.dll,Control_RunDLL"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: etects RunDLL32.exe spawning explorer.exe as child, which is very uncommon, often observes Gamarue spawning the explorer.exe process in an unusual w
